alert.note: Alert for Dent; Shannon; Texas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 8:08AM CDT until April 05 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Shannon County in south central Missouri... Dent County in south central Missouri... Northeastern Texas County in south central Missouri... * Until 900 AM CDT. * At 808 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Salem, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Montauk State Park, Salem, Licking, Houston, Bunker, Raymondville, Montauk, Turtle, Jadwin, Howes Mill, Darien, Gladden, Bangert, Yukon, Boss, Howes, Solo, Akers, Stone Hill and Sligo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM CDT for south central Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM CDT for south central Missouri.
